name: Maryland Fried Soft-Shell Crabs
keywords: appetizer, flour, soft-shell crab, vegetable oil, spring
recipeIngredient: Lemon wedges and tartar sauce, optional

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and clean crabs by cutting off the face just behind the eyes. Lift top of shell and remove the spongy fingers. If the crab is a female (identified by striped markings), remove the back or apron. Rinse and dry.
Season flour with salt and pepper and mix in baking powder. Dredge crabs in mixture.
Pour oil into skillet to depth of 1 inch. Heat to 375 degrees. Cook crabs on both sides until brown, 4 to 5 minutes. Drain and serve with lemon wedges and tartar sauce, if desired.
